EmailTemplate.name: India/SS61.03-18-21 BNK India SS61 Email 3.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: New eBook: The Case for ATM Cash Recycling in India
EmailTemplate.textOnly: As financial institutions expand their banking services to the millions of underbanked citizens, they’re finding it essential to identify and use the most efficient cash management model.  Cash recycling technology can aid that model and impact it in a positive way. It offers your bank the ability to: - Reduce operational costs - Increase productivity - Improve customer experience - Enhance security - Differentiate your brand Download our new ebook to explore the benefits for your customers and your business. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
